title: On Sunday, the shadow of the Moon passed across Africa and the Atlantic Ocean. This was the last solar...

attachments.displayName:
On Sunday, the shadow of the Moon passed across Africa and the Atlantic Ocean. This was the last solar eclipse of the year. The Elektro-L satellite was able to observe the eclipse, and we can see the darkness of the lunar shadow covering Africa.

More here >>
http://www.planetary.org/blogs/guest-blogs/2013/the-solar-eclipse-in-africa.html

(Image: Roscosmos / Vitaliy Egorov)

object.content:

annotation:
No podrás verlo pero igual si seguirlo por internet, este próximo domingo ya lo tendrás +Teresa D , o eso espero y parece. 
Siempre tuviste mucha capacidad de recuperación rápida de todo. Eres admirable en tantos aspectos.
Te quiero !
